page.title: 09INTERESTING PEOPLE WILLAND
page.content: {MRS VILE}A VISIT BY NICHOLA RIDGEWAY AND MICHELLE KELLOW. MRS VILE IS THE SUNDAY SCHOOL TEACHER AT THE LOCAL CHAPEL. SHE SAID WHERE THE SUNDAY SCHOOL MEET NOW WAS ONCE WHERE THE PRIEST LEFT HIS HORSE AND CART. SHE HAS BEEN THE SUNDAY SCHOOL TEACHER FOR 40 YEARS. SHE LOVES THE CHILDREN. SHE IS SOON TO RETIRE. SUNDAY SCHOOL STARTS AT 11am AND FINISHES AT 12pm. IN THE SUMMER THE SUNDAY SCHOOL HAVE A CAMP.{ THE DENTIST}A VISIT BY MARIE EDWORTHY AND LORRAINE HUNT. MR KIETH THOMAS IS ONE OF THE LOCAL DENTISTS.HE IS ABOUT 30 YEARS OLD AND MARRIED. HE LIKES HIS JOB VERY MUCH.HE LIVES IN WILLAND. HE RECOMMENDS A SENSODYNE TOOTH BRUSH AND FLORIDE TOOTH PASTE. HE TAKES OUT ABOUT 4 TEETH A WEEK. MR THOMAS LIKES THE IDEA TO PUT FLORIDE IN THE WATER SUPPLY. THE BUILDING WHICH HAS THE SURGERY IS 77 YEARS OLD.
